com.facebook.buck.parser.api

Interface ProjectBuildFileParser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator, EventReportingProjectBuildFileParser, ForwardingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator, HybridProjectBuildFileParser, PythonDslProjectBuildFileParser, SkylarkProjectBuildFileParser, TargetCountVerificationParserDecorator

    public interface ProjectBuildFileParser
extends AutoCloseable
    Parses buck build files (usually BUCK files) and retrieve rule information from them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      BuildFileManifest getBuildFileManifest(Path buildFile)
      Collect all rules from a particular build file, along with meta rules about the rules, for example which build files the rules depend on.
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<String> getIncludedFiles(Path buildFile)
      Collects the loaded build file and extensions when parsing the buildFile build spec.
      boolean globResultsMatchCurrentState(Path buildFile, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<GlobSpecWithResult> existingGlobsWithResults)
      Checks if existing GlobSpecs with results are the same as current state in the file system.
      void reportProfile()
      Reports profile information captured while parsing build files.

    • Method Detail

      • getBuildFileManifest

        BuildFileManifest getBuildFileManifest(Path buildFile)
                                throws BuildFileParseException,
                                       InterruptedException,
                                       IOException
        Collect all rules from a particular build file, along with meta rules about the rules, for example which build files the rules depend on.
        Parameters:
        buildFile - should be an absolute path to a build file. Must have rootPath as its prefix.
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException
        InterruptedException
        IOException

      • globResultsMatchCurrentState

        boolean globResultsMatchCurrentState(Path buildFile,
                                     com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<GlobSpecWithResult> existingGlobsWithResults)
                              throws IOException,
                                     InterruptedException
        Checks if existing GlobSpecs with results are the same as current state in the file system.
        Parameters:
        existingGlobsWithResults - the existing (deserialized) GlobSpecWithResult to check the file system state against.
        buildFile - the buildFile location to be used by the Globber.
        Returns:
        true if glob expansion produces results matching previously recorded ones, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
